pr_title: Add log message if computer is not trusted

timeline.message: Add log message if computer is not trusted

timeline.bodyText: Is there a way we can detect this before trying to upload the app?
timeline.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText:
Running ios-deploy -C fails if computer is not trusted:
ios-deploy -C
[....] Waiting for iOS device to be connected
[....] Using a98438b083503e27713fa4863XXXXX (D221AP, iPhone X, iphoneos, arm64) a.k.a. 'iPhone'.
Assertion failed: (AMDeviceIsPaired(device)), function get_battery_level, file /tmp/ios-deploy-20200102-40963-7r6yxb/src/ios-deploy/ios-deploy.m, line 1356.
zsh: abort      ios-deploy -C

If the computer is trusted:
ios-deploy -C
[....] Waiting for iOS device to be connected
[....] Using a98438b083503e27713fa4863XXXXX (D221AP, iPhone X, iphoneos, arm64) a.k.a. 'iPhone.
BatteryCurrentCapacity:79


Should be easy to test in advance, right after checking that ios-deploy is installed?
replies.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText: I've pushed that change, it will fail fast now if the computer is not trusted.
replies.author: jperedadnr

timeline.message: Check battery level to verify computer is trusted
